children.value:
it turns out I strongly desire to document my home systems in ways strongly akin to Jeff the Speed Cleaner of the insane org-roam evergreen notes taking dude. Or Gwern.
Which is to say, simple, relative to the task at hand.; and capable of explicatingthe nexcessaity of any difficulty as well as evidencing its lack of necessity where it is actually unnecessary, because I've collated it all in one place to reason about nicely.
hmm. Marie Kondo links here also.
